Hi {{lead.First Name}}
Thank you for registering for the Honeywell Webinar (details below).
{{my.Add to Calendar:default=edit me}}
HGT1700 Webinar April 7, 2021 7:00-8:00 a.m. MST
In order to facilitate a more interactive discussion, this webinar will be held through a Microsoft Teams meeting. Please look forward to an invitation to the meeting from me soon.
Thank you, Jeff Kucharski
jeff.a.kucharski@honeywell.com
